title: Apple iPod touch (7th Generation) Media Player
description: Apple's latest iPod touch is truly in a league of its own when it comes to sheer entertainment capabilities. Equipped with the same A10 Fusion chip as the iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus, a 4-inch Retina touch screen, an 8 MP camera, and Apple iOS, the device can do a whole lot more than play your MP3 collection.
